title: How to Make Rooh Afza

steps.headline: Purchase a bottle of Rooh Afza syrup.
Place 225ml (7.6oz) of water or milk in a 350ml (12oz)  glass.
Add 2 tbsp (40ml) of Rooh Afza syrup to water or milk (more or less according to taste).
Stir until the syrup is completely dissolved.
Add 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar, if desired, to taste.
Add two or three mint leaves and ice cubes.
steps.description: You can also add some chopped pistachio nuts or slivered almonds to your drink.

text: Purchase a bottle of Rooh Afza syrup.  Place 225ml (7.6oz) of water or milk in a 350ml (12oz)  glass.  Add 2 tbsp (40ml) of Rooh Afza syrup to water or milk (more or less according to taste).  Stir until the syrup is completely dissolved.  Add 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar, if desired, to taste.  Add two or three mint leaves and ice cubes. You can also add some chopped pistachio nuts or slivered almonds to your drink. Finished.
